Attribute.AttributeName: Gendarme.Framework.Solution("Review the InheritanceDemand on this type and either remove it or change its SecurityAction to, probably, a LinkDemand.")
Gendarme.Framework.Problem("This sealed type has an InheritanceDemand that the runtime will never execute.")

Docs.summary: This rule checks for sealed types that have InheritanceDemand declarative security applied on them. Since those types cannot be inherited from the InheritanceDemand will never be executed by the runtime. Check if the permission is required and, if so, change the SecurityAction to the correct one. Otherwise remove the permission.
Docs.remarks: Before Gendarme 2.2 this rule was part of Gendarme.Rules.Security and named SealedTypeWithInheritanceDemandRule.
